name: CKRecord.ID
desc: An object that uniquely identifies a record in a database.

items.name: init(recordName: String)
items.desc: Creates a new record ID with the specified name in the default zone.

items.name: init(recordName: String, zoneID: CKRecordZone.ID)
items.desc: Creates a new record ID with the specified name and zone information.

items.name: let CKRecordNameZoneWideShare: String
items.desc: The name of a share record that manages a shared record zone.

items.name: var recordName: String
items.desc: The unique name of the record.

items.name: var zoneID: CKRecordZone.ID
items.desc: The ID of the zone that contains the record.
